text: Cusco Province is the smallest of thirteen provinces in the Cusco Region in southern Peru. ==Political division== The province has eight districts (Spanish: distritos, singular: distrito). Each of the districts are led by a mayor (alcalde). The districts, with their capitals, are: * Ccorca (Ccorca) * Cusco (Cusco) * Poroy (Poroy) * San Jer칩nimo (San Jer칩nimo) * San Sebasti치n (San Sebasti치n) * Santiago (Santiago) * Saylla (Saylla) * Wanchaq (Wanchaq) ==Other websites== Category:Provinces of Peru Category:Cusco Region
title: Cusco Province
